roleset.name: attach fatty acids to a membrane protein

role.descr: fatty acid, molecule added to Arg1

example.name: example with agent
example.text: In our final set of in vitro studies, we palmitoylated the version of SAP97 that contained mutations in PDZ2 that disrupted its physical association with GluA1.
example.arg: the version of SAP97 that contained mutations in PDZ2 that disrupted its physical association with GluA1

example.name: example with instrument
example.text: The hemagglutinin of influenza virus is palmitoylated with long-chain fatty acids.
